imdb.plot outline: Donny is a rock star... No not really, but in his heart he is. Unfortunately, the reality for Donny is a little different. He is a teacher, in the public school system. One day, fed up with targets, lectures & non-performing students, he has what he would call: "A total moment of clarity" and what others would call a "Mid Life Crisis" to follow his dream: touring festivals in the USA in his VW Campervan & reviving his old band, "Hot Target". Daphne is a teaching assistant who always dreamed of an exciting life on the road as a new age travel presenter. Underwhelmed by her current life & feeling in a rut, she is inspired by Donny's dynamic attitude & decides to join him on a quest for adventure, fulfillment, the real meaning to life & the best vegan burrito in the USA. This adventurous, travel based Romantic Comedy is the story of what happens when two people truly decide to leave their existing life behind to follow their dreams. With exciting writing from rising star Ellie Laverne, adventure travel & comedy author & screenwriter of Barcelona Nights, "Sunny Side Up" is a pioneering web series dealing with the darker & lighter sides of life, human existence & chasing one's dream.
imdb.title: Sunny Side Up
plot: Donny is a rock star... No not really, but in his heart he is. Unfortunately, the reality for Donny is a little different. He is a teacher, in the public school system. One day, fed up with targets, lectures & non-performing students, he has what he would call: "A total moment of clarity" and what others would call a "Mid Life Crisis" to follow his dream: touring festivals in the USA in his VW Campervan & reviving his old band, "Hot Target". Daphne is a teaching assistant who always dreamed of an exciting life on the road as a new age travel presenter. Underwhelmed by her current life & feeling in a rut, she is inspired by Donny's dynamic attitude & decides to join him on a quest for adventure, fulfillment, the real meaning to life & the best vegan burrito in the USA. This adventurous, travel based Romantic Comedy is the story of what happens when two people truly decide to leave their existing life behind to follow their dreams. With exciting writing from rising star Ellie Laverne, adventure travel & comedy author & screenwriter of Barcelona Nights, "_Sunny Side Up_ (qv)" is a pioneering web series dealing with the darker & lighter sides of life, human existence & chasing one's dream.::David Leonard
